column3: Concept ACK on adding the missing headers. \n\nIn the future I'd prefer if these scripts were moved out of `bitcoin/bitcoin`; maybe into the maintainer tools repository. To me it seems a bit ridiculous that we've got 600 lines of bash in this repository to do copyright header "management".

>  To me it seems a bit ridiculous that we've got 600 lines of bash \n\nI think it is python, but still ridiculous. Though having it in the repo, at least allows to do it in a scripted-diff. For the future, I am hoping we can get rid of the years after (c).
@hebasto sounds like a good idea to me. There was no particular reason copyright headers were left out of the files.
Why is this needed? Couldn't the function where you copied this from be used?
